name: Andre' GAY, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD Sec. of Dept. of Corrections; Louis Folino Supt. of S.C.I. Greene; Program Review Committee of S.C.I. Greene & Capt. Walter, Appellees

parties: Andre’ GAY, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD Sec. of Dept. of Corrections; Louis Folino Supt. of S.C.I. Greene; Program Review Committee of S.C.I. Greene & Capt. Walter, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of June, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
46 A.3d 1285
Andre’ GAY, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD Sec. of Dept. of Corrections; Louis Folino Supt. of S.C.I. Greene; Program Review Committee of S.C.I. Greene & Capt. Walter, Appellees.

June 18, 2012.
